tn.esprit.querybuilder.interfaces

Interface QbWhere


  • public interface QbWhere
    Generates a WHERE clause. For use in SELECT and UPDATE queries.
    Author:
    Dhia

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  QbWhere.QbWhereOperator
      The where operator.

      Generates an IN clause.
      QbWhere whereNotIn(QbField field, java.lang.String placeholder, int count)

    • Method Detail

      • where

        QbWhere where(QbField field,
              java.lang.String placeholder)
        Constructs a where clause. If there are already where clauses in the query, its added as a AND WHERE.
        Parameters:
        field -
        placeholder -
        Returns:
        This where builder.

      • where

        QbWhere where(QbField field,
              QbWhere.QbWhereOperator op,

        Similar to where but allows you to specify a where operator.

        op -
        placeholder -
        Returns:
        This where builder.

      • orWhere

        QbWhere orWhere(QbField field,
                java.lang.String placeholder)
        Similar to where but is joined by an OR WHERE.

        placeholder -
        Returns:
        This where builder.

        placeholder -
        Returns:

      • where

        QbWhere where(java.lang.String custom)
        Allows you to specify a custom where clause. Not recommended for use unless an appropriate clause can't be constructed with other methods.
        Parameters:
        custom -
        Returns:
        This where builder.

      • whereIn

        QbWhere whereIn(QbField field,
                java.lang.String placeholder,
                int count)
        Generates an IN clause.
        Parameters:
        field -
        placeholder - - Using this placeholder will return the index of the first placeholder.
        count - - The number of placeholders to place in the query.
        Returns:
        This where builder.

      • orWhereIn

                  java.lang.String placeholder,

        Similar to whereIn but joined with an OR.
        Parameters:
        field -
        placeholder -
        count -
        Returns:
        This where builder.

        Returns:
        This where builder.

      • getPlaceholderIndex

        int getPlaceholderIndex(java.lang.String placeholderName)
        Gets the placeholder index. Usually you don't call this directly and get the placeholder index from the QbQuery which will check its own placeholders as well as those from any where clause.
        Parameters:
        placeholderName -
        Returns:
        The placeholder index.

        int getPlaceholderCount()
        Gets the number of placeholders.
        Returns:
